before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8q6dr","text":"Cut the tip of the pipette man tips in advance to make the outlet wider.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"84l9t","text":"This protocol is intended for extraction of high molecular weight DNA from fungal samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: fungi,DNA extraction,HMW,long read sequencing,Nanopore,National Museum of Nature and Science

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bshqa","text":"The frozen mycelium samples are ground to fine powders using a mortar and pestle in liquid nitrogen to avoid raising the temperature of the samples for high molecular weight DNA extraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"151kg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"empa","text":"Add   of pre-warmed ( ) lysis buffer with   ProteinaseK (FUJIFILM Wako Pure Chemical Co., Ltd. Japan) and   RNase A (Nippon Gene Material Co., Ltd. Japan) in a glass beaker. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":106,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7i8mv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rmf0","text":"  lysis buffer [2% CTAB, 100mM TrisHCl, 20mM EDTA, 1.4M NaCl, 1% PVP)] {"blocks":[{"key":"bidua","text":"The mixture was incubated at 55 °C in a water bath with shaking for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2eqfv","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ba7vh","text":"  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6D2833365D4E11EC95CA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"714244435D4E11EC95CA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7q2r2","text":"Add  1 vol phenol/chloroform/isoamylic alcohol (PCI) 25:24:1 and mix by inversion.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fqn7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7i13o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ipml","text":"Rinse pellet with 1mL 75% ethanol at RT. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"av6rk","text":"   75% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9oint","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"6A3009B05D5111ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fca2n","text":"Air dry DNA pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ji63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bg6gr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fmqvl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"crrgt","text":"If you have a good nose, you can use the smell to determine if the ethanol is gone.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vr2e","text":"Extracted DNA was quantified spectrophotometrically with NanoDrop (Thermo Fisher Scientific, USA) and in a Qubit 2.0 fluorometer (Thermo Fisher Scientific). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56sl2","text":"The quality of DNA was estimated using Genomic DNA ScreenTape assay with 2200 TapeStation system (Agilent Technologies, Germany).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5a7gp","text":"Centrifuge 12000 rpm (13000 g) with soft/slow break function for  20 min at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ac54","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bhid","text":"     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bl6l0","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6837j","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1v5dc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"12000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"07361B205D4E11EC95CA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"13000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"615586B05D4E11ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"0A68AF855D4E11EC95CA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0C5211605D4E11EC8B5883F6B75545DF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dcgo9","text":"Remove aqueous layer to new 50 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eo4i","text":"Repeat step 4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ptvm","text":"Add 1 vol chloroform and mix by inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amgc6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq2nh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"qlqg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"777st","text":"Always work with chloroform in a fume hood.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4b2pk","text":"Centrifuge 14000 rpm (17800 g) with soft/slow break function for  10 min at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kd6","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2op91","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f42q0","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0qjv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5AFADE805D5011ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"17800","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5F1DD4405D5011ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"6D19B1905D5011ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"725C6F305D5011ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a898","text":"Add 1 vol isopropanol and mix gently by inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9j3bg","text":"Centrifuge 14000 rpm for  5 min at 4 °C. Remove and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eipup","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"38vrj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2gmqf","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ubuv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3165EBE05D5111ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"17800","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"35D7EC005D5111ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"3EF831F05D5111ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"429778C05D5111ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"78nc5","text":" All aqueous and pellet to new 2 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9qhhe","text":"Spin down and remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qvag","text":"Resuspend DNA in sterile 50uL 10mM Tris-HCl for 1 hr~ at RT in dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"169sv","text":"  Tris-HCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1jtlg","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"310or","text":" ~  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7pb0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfsdk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dbi2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"D72E4D005D5211ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"86F77AF05D5211ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"B1EA5A705D5211ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"BC7D6A405D5211ECBB01DB8330B91340","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"duqqc","text":"DO NOT vortex or pipet to resuspend. Gently flick the tube and leave room temperature in dark for up to overnight.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"328oj","text":"Store at 4 °C until library preparation. (at -20 °C for long-term storage)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6kep","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
